paragraphs.content: This Agreement shall enter into force on {{ date }} and is concluded for an indefinite period of time (the **"Term**"). The Agreement may be terminated in accordance with Clause {{ termination_clause_idx }}, in which case it shall terminate with immediate effect without prior written notice being required.

Either Party may terminate this Agreement at any time by giving written notice with a notice period of {{ notice_period_amount }} {{ notice_period_unit }}, without prejudice to the provisions of Clause {{ termination_clause_idx }}.
The Principal expressly agrees that the Contractor is entitled to perform services for other clients as well.
